ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Decking out my Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Shawn Alley  To:  Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 1:34 PM Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Decking out my Enchanter
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Shawn Alley <shawna@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 1:34 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Decking out my Enchanter


> you'll want to go for +cha and +int items with +cha being more important I
> think; but it really depends on the situation. I have a savants cap,
green
> silken drape, and incandescent gloves (which are a very easy quest). Next
> I'd like to quest for the incandescent mask but the rune in mistmoore will
> be a bit of a pain I think.
>

I found the most difficult part of that quest to be getting the rune from
Madame Serena in quenos. You must have quite good faction with her before
she will give you the rune you need, unless you know of the tricks to get
her to ignore your faction.

Cogg - RZ
